overview: This fascinating release offers extensive documentary footage of Kris Kristofferson and his band, as well as some stunning musical performances. Widely known as an artist with a strong social conscience, Kristofferson's tireless campaigning for a better world is extensively profiled. The interviews segue nicely with the performances, making this a great demonstration of Kris's many talents. Tracks include "Me and Bobby McGee," "To Beat The Devil," "Under The Gun," and many others.
title: Kris Kristofferson: Breakthrough
